Universal.hook_strategy: The 'Impossible' Question or 'High Stakes' result shown immediately.
Universal.pacing: Fast. New visual/info every 3-5 seconds. Escalating stakes every minute.
retention_rules: The 'Fichten Curve': Continuous rising action.
No Fluff: Cut anything that doesn't advance the plot.
Midpoint Twist: Re-contextualize the goal halfway through.

Gaming.hook_strategy: Show the failure first (The 'Noob' moment) OR the God-Tier loot. Shout out the challenge constraint immediately.
Gaming.pacing: Hyper-Fast (Gen Z/Alpha attention). Meme-style editing cues. Loud, energetic delivery.
retention_rules: Spectacle over Logic: If it looks cool, keep it.
The 30-Second Rule: Something funny or loud must happen every 30s.
Community Callouts: Reference memes or internal jokes.

Documentary.hook_strategy: Present a Counter-Intuitive Fact or a 'Glitch in the Matrix'. 'You think you know X, but actually...'
Documentary.pacing: Measured but dense. Each section reveals a new layer of the mystery.
retention_rules: The Visual Analogy: Explain complex topics with simple physical props or metaphors.
Open Loops: Start a side-story but don't finish it until later.
Deep Dive: Don't just skim surface level; go oddly deep into one specific detail.

Finance.hook_strategy: The 'Pain Point' or 'The Secret Number'. 'Why you're staying poor' or 'How I made $X in Y days'.
Finance.pacing: Authoritative, Punchy. Text on screen for every number. High contrast.
Finance.emotional_arc: Fear of Missing Out (FOMO) -> Hope -> Action Plan
retention_rules: Social Proof: Show charts, screenshots, or receipts early.
Step-by-Step: Number your lists (Step 1, Step 2). People watch to the end of a list.
Contrarian Take: Attack a popular belief ('Savings accounts are a scam').

Tech.hook_strategy: The B-Roll Beauty Shot + The Conclusion Tease. 'Is this worth $1000?'
Tech.pacing: Crisp. Clean transitions. Focus on aesthetics and specs.
retention_rules: The Easter Egg: Hide small details for commenters to find.
Feature Stacking: Compare it to the 'King' of the category.
The 'Nitpick': Find one small flaw to build trust.

Horror.hook_strategy: The 'Uncanny Valley' Audio/Visual. A distorted image or 911 call audio. Atmosphere is king.
Horror.pacing: Slow, deliberate. Silence is used as a weapon.
retention_rules: Show Less: Let the audience imagine the monster.
Audio Design: Use low-frequency hums (Infrasound) to cause unease.
The 'Real' Evidence: Emphasize that 'This is 100% true'.

Health.hook_strategy: The 'Mistake' you are making. 'Stop doing Crunches!'
retention_rules: Anatomy Visuals: Show the muscle/organ working.
Myth Busting: Destroy a common misconception.
Immediate Application: Give a tip they can do *right now*.

Vlog.hook_strategy: In Medias Res. Start in the middle of the chaos/action.
retention_rules: The Time-Lapse: Show passage of time cinematically.
The 'Confessional': Talk directly to lens in a quiet moment.
Show the Gear: Briefly mention setup to engage tech nerds.
